turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how may i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'd like to order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to try the ginger bread latte grande size with super scent milk, and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it, anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks. That'll be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is a grande ginger bread latte with 2% milk and whipped cream from starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that all correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which starbucks did you want me to place this order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one located on 509 West Wisconsin Avenue, Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said 509 west avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. the total for this order is $5.00.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to charge the card on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, charge the card, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready at the Starbucks on 509 west in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks. That will be it, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool, you are welcome.
